summary: Three Australian lieutenants are court martialed for executing prisoners as a way of deflecting attention from war crimes committed by their superior officers.
cast: Edward Woodward|Jack Thompson|John Waters|Bryan Brown|Charles 'Bud' Tingwell|Terence Donovan|Vincent Ball|Ray Meagher|Chris Haywood|Russell Kiefel|Lewis Fitz-Gerald|Rod Mullinar|Alan Cassell|Rob Steele|Chris Smith|Bruno Knez|John Pfitzner|Frank Wilson|Michael Procanin|Ray Ball|Wayne Bell|Halifa Cisse|Norman Currer|Bridget Cornish|Judy Dick|Barbara West|Ria Erskine|Ian Gray|Sylvia Horseman|Dick Henderson|Alan Lovett|Trevor Mann|Jon Nicholls|Peter Osborn|Ron Peterson|Don Quin|Maria Reid|Ron Rodger|Nellie Seidel|Laurie Walton|Hank Bernard|Elspeth Radford
keywords: court martial|based on true story|based on play|character name as title|nickname in title
title: Consejo de guerra
